
=Retrieve,!FileSize=

==Syntax==
{{{
Retrieve,FileSize,<Filename>,<%var%> 
}}}
This function is used to calculate the size of a file and store it inside a variable.
 * Filename is the target file
 * %var% is a user defined variable used to store the size of the file (in bytes) 

== Syntax example: ==
{{{
Retrieve,FolderSize,c:\myFolder,%var%
}}}
